subject: Question about pedals
description_text: Hey I have a question about your newest updated pedals. Do they come with the haptics mounted horizontally instead of vertically like they were before?

conversations.body_text: Hi J G, ​Here is the latest installation method for this product:  ​You can refer to the following link: https://www.instagram.com/p/DQ_WxBuDLVU/
